articles.title: Planes struggle to land battling fierce winds as Typhoon Podul slams Taiwan
articles.summary:
ğŸ“° ê³µí•­, ê¸°ìˆ  ê´€ë ¨ ë‰´ìŠ¤
ğŸ“¢ Planes struggle to land battling fierce winds as Typhoon Podul slams Taiwan
articles.content: Pilots trying to land at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport on August 12, faced fierce crosswinds from Typhoon Podul. Dramatic footage captured planes swaying side-to-side and bouncing as they landed on the runway. Some flights were forced to perform go-arounds before landing on their second attempt.

articles.title: Power fault on Sengkang-Punggol LRT line: Service fully restored, says SBS Transit
articles.summary:
ğŸ“° êµí†µ, ê¸°ìˆ  ê´€ë ¨ ë‰´ìŠ¤
ğŸ“¢ Power fault on Sengkang-Punggol LRT line: Service fully restored, says SBS Trans...
articles.content: Services on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT (SPLRT) have been fully restored by about 12.50pm, said SBS Transit. Free regular bus and bridging bus services have stopped. This facilitated inspection of cables and will enable repairs to take place more efficiently in the evening. In a Facebook post at about 12.40pm, SBS Transit group chief executive Jeffrey Sim said that at...
